item.title: Build_hugo_site
item.description: 搭建Hugo博客网站 测试语法 测试图片 API bbb 发布文章 hugo new post/xxxx.md 发布github hugo -t even Reference https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000012975914?utm_source=tag-newest https://juejin.im/post/5e9cf8bd51882538083fec4c#heading-1 https://www.jianshu.com/p/475110a1c811 同even博客: https://edward852.github.io/ hugo添加Algolia搜索支持: https://edward852.github.io/post/hugo%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0algolia%E6%90%9C%E7%B4%A2%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81/
